attributes.action: Expand the Electoral Commission’s Powers to Tackle Overseas Political Investment
attributes.additional_details:
There were rumours about Elon Musk potentially donating £78 Million to Reform UK after the July Election (BBC News, 2024), these rumours are especially credible given his $281 Million contribution to Donald Trump's re-election campaign.

Reference: https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/c1kez8d2dygo
attributes.background: Expand the Commission's powers to tackle overseas political investment, especially via UK-registered companies, to prevent foreign interference in our elections. These expanded powers must ensure that companies cannot be used as conduits for illegal foreign investments in our political parties.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Tighten the rules on political donations
